content: discover the versatility of plaid on this timelessly designed crochet throw for the home stitched in red heart super saver this crochet blanket is great for practicing chain double_crochet and surface slip_stitch techniques choose your favorite home decor colors and create an attractive mesh pattern that agrees with your space materials red heart® super saver® 7 oz/198 g 364 yds/333 m contrast a real teal 0656 2 balls or 575 yds/520 m contrast b soft white 0316 3 balls or 855 yds/775 m contrast c shocking pink 0718 1 ball or 364 yds/333 m contrast d aruba sea 0505 2 balls or 465 yds/420 m gauges 12 single_crochet and 13 row = 4 10 cm 13 sts and 8 5 row = 4 10 cm in mesh pat
